name: select_from_list
label: Select from list
hint: Choose the class of rocks for the mineral

name: note_for_developers_we_would
label: Note for developers: we would like the full mineral name displayed, with chemical formula, once they have selected the mineral from a list or entered the mineral abbreviation.

name: textural_setting_igneous
label: Textural Setting - Igneous
hint: If mineral is in igneous rock, choose textural setting

name: textural_setting_metamorphic
label: Textural Setting - Metamorphic/Structural
hint: If mineral is metamorphic, or displays structural significance, choose textural setting
